description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 23/01419/FUL (Replacement Penrhyn Road entrance door including installation of canopy cover, erection of new passenger lift adjacent Picton Room Courtyard, and associated development) to increase in size of revolving door at main campus entrance and increase in height of the lift overrun.

KEYACH Name: Kingston Town Centre Key Area of Change
SMKCON Name: Borough Wide Smoke Control Order
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: Condition 2 of planning permission 23/01419/FUL is amended as follows: 3941-BMJ-ZZ-00-DR-A-APL (00)01 Site Location Plan 3941-BMJ-ZZ-00-DR-A-APL (00)02 Rev A Block Plan 3941-BMJ-ZZ-00-DR-A-APL (00)03 Existing Ground Floor Plan 3941-BMJ-ZZ-00-DR-A-APL (00)04 Rev A Proposed Ground Floor Plan 3941-BMJ-ZZ-00-DR-A-APL (00)05 Rev A Existing and Proposed West Elevations 3941-BMJ-ZZ-00-DR-A-APL (00)06 Rev A Proposed North and South Elevations 3941-BMJ-ZZ-00-DR-A-APL (00)07 Rev A Proposed Entrance Front Elevation 3941-BMJ-ZZ-00-DR-A-APL (00)08 Rev A Existing and Proposed North and West Elevations (Picton Room Courtyard Elevations (Lift)3941-BMJ-ZZ-00-DR-A-APL(00)09 Rev A Existing and Proposed Picton Room Courtyard West Elevations 3941-BMJ-ZZ-00-DR-A-APL (00)10 Penrhyn Road Canopy Detail I3941-BMJ-ZZ-00-DR-A-APL(00)11 Canopy Detail II The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.All other conditions imposed on the original permission still apply.
